languages.text: "Вышивала гобелены во славу национальных героев. Ха!" {n}Идира заходится каркающим смехом.{/n} "Да тем же, чем и здесь, Лорд-капитан: прорицала. Наши правители ценили возможность заглянуть в будущее — каждый найденный {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} на Лейре стоил маленькое состояние".

traits.locale_text: "Вышивала гобелены во славу национальных героев. Ха!" {n}Идира заходится каркающим смехом.{/n} "Да тем же, чем и здесь, Лорд-капитан: прорицала. Наши правители ценили возможность заглянуть в будущее — каждый найденный {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} на Лейре стоил маленькое состояние".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

Наши правители ценили возможность заглянуть в будущее — каждый найденный {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} на Лейре стоил маленькое состояние".

Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我负责制作民族英雄纪念品的刺绣挂件，哈！”{n}伊迪拉咯咯笑了起来。{/n}“和这里的工作一样：占卜，舰长大人。我们的统治者非常重视预知未来的能力。在莱拉，每位{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}都身价不菲。”
languages.original_text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

traits.locale_text: “我负责制作民族英雄纪念品的刺绣挂件，哈！”{n}伊迪拉咯咯笑了起来。{/n}“和这里的工作一样：占卜，舰长大人。我们的统治者非常重视预知未来的能力。在莱拉，每位{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}都身价不菲。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every psyker that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

languages.text: «Bordaba tapices en honor de nuestros héroes nacionales. ¡Ja!». {n}Idira se carcajea.{/n} «Lo mismo que hago aquí, Lord Capitán: augurar. Nuestros gobernantes valoraban la capacidad de ver el futuro; todos los {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g} valían una pequeña fortuna en Leira».
languages.original_text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

traits.locale_text: «Bordaba tapices en honor de nuestros héroes nacionales. ¡Ja!». {n}Idira se carcajea.{/n} «Lo mismo que hago aquí, Lord Capitán: augurar. Nuestros gobernantes valoraban la capacidad de ver el futuro; todos los {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g} valían una pequeña fortuna en Leira».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「国家的英雄に敬意を表して壁掛けの刺繍を編んだのよ。ハッ！」{n}イディラは笑う。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あたいはここでも同じことをしたわ。つまり、占いをね。支配者たちは未来を見通す能力を珍重していたのよ。{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は、レイラでささやかな幸運を見つけることができるだろうって」
languages.original_text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

traits.locale_text: 「国家的英雄に敬意を表して壁掛けの刺繍を編んだのよ。ハッ！」{n}イディラは笑う。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あたいはここでも同じことをしたわ。つまり、占いをね。支配者たちは未来を見通す能力を珍重していたのよ。{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は、レイラでささやかな幸運を見つけることができるだろうって」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Wandbehänge zu Ehren unserer nationalen Helden bestickt. Ha!" {n}Idira gackert.{/n} "Ich habe dasselbe getan wie hier auch, Lord Captain: weisgesagt. Die Fähigkeit, in die Zukunft zu sehen, war bei unseren Herrschen sehr begehrt — jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} war auf Leira ein kleines Vermögen wert."
languages.original_text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Wandbehänge zu Ehren unserer nationalen Helden bestickt. Ha!" {n}Idira gackert.{/n} "Ich habe dasselbe getan wie hier auch, Lord Captain: weisgesagt. Die Fähigkeit, in die Zukunft zu sehen, war bei unseren Herrschen sehr begehrt — jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} war auf Leira ein kleines Vermögen wert."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je brodais des tentures à l'effigie de nos héros nationaux, {n}répond Idira, puis elle pousse un petit rire.{/n} Ha ! Je faisais la même chose qu'ici, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : de la divination. Nos dirigeants accordaient une grande valeur à la capacité de voir l'avenir : sur Leira, les {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} valaient une petite fortune. »
languages.original_text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

traits.locale_text: « Je brodais des tentures à l'effigie de nos héros nationaux, {n}répond Idira, puis elle pousse un petit rire.{/n} Ha ! Je faisais la même chose qu'ici, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : de la divination. Nos dirigeants accordaient une grande valeur à la capacité de voir l'avenir : sur Leira, les {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} valaient une petite fortune. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ulusal kahramanlarımızın şerefine duvar kilimi dokuyordum. Ha ha!" {n}İdira kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Tabii ki buradaki gibi kehanetlerle meşguldüm Lord Kaptan. Hükümdarlarımız, geleceği görme yeteneğine pek kıymet verirdi. Leira'daki her bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}, birer servet değerindeydi."
languages.original_text: "I embroidered wall hangings in honour of our national heroes. Ha!" {n}Idira cackles.{/n} "I did the same thing I do here, Lord Captain: divining. Our rulers prized the ability to see into the future — every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} that could be found was worth a small fortune on Leira."

traits.locale_text: "Ulusal kahramanlarımızın şerefine duvar süsleri işlerdim. Haha!" {n}İdira kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Buradakinden farklı bir şey yapmıyordum Lord Kaptan. Yine kehanetlerle meşguldüm. Hükümdarlarımız, geleceği görme kabiliyetine pek kıymet verirlerdi. Ellerine geçirdikleri her bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}, Leira'da küçük bir servet sahibi olmak demekti."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
